text: @realDonaldTrump Coming from someone who confused Kansas and Missouri.. thinks Colorado borders Mexico..was  talking with the president of PR.. confused Dayton and Toledo.. referred to 9/11 as 7/11.. said we’d have one million eight hundred and seventy thousand million tests' for coronavirus..
